name: Chicken Dum Biryani
description: A delightfully wholesome dish of aromatic chicken biryani prepared in typical dum style.

name: Chicken 65
description: Crispy, juicy, and aromatic bites perfect for any occasion.

name: Sp Pot Biryani [Bone Less]
description: Aromatic biryani with tender boneless meat, perfectly balanced spices and fluffy long grains of rice.

name: Special Veg Fried Rice
description: Spicy and flavorful rice stir-fried with mixed vegetables, seasoned with aromatic spices, making a perfect vegetarian delight.

name: Spl Pot Biryani
description: Aromatic basmati rice cooked with special spices, layered with tender vegetables and spices in a traditional pot.

name: Paneer Butter Masala
description: Rich and creamy dish made with soft paneer cubes simmered in a buttery, mildly spiced tomato-based gravy.

name: Chicken Lollypop
description: Spicy, crispy fried chicken wings coated with flavorful spices, served with tangy dipping sauce.

name: Chilli Chicken
description: Succulent chicken pieces tossed in a spicy chili sauce with bell peppers and onions, a favorite Indo-Chinese dish.

name: Puri
description: Fluffy and deep-fried Indian bread served with a side of spiced potato curry.

name: Chapathi
description: Soft, whole-wheat flatbread served with a side of vegetable curry or chutney.

name: Parota
description: Layered flatbread made with flour, served with a spicy vegetable kurma.

name: Uthapam
description: Thick dosa topped with onions, tomatoes, and chilies, served with chutney and sambhar.

name: Masala Idly
description: Soft idlis tossed in a spicy masala mix with onions and curry leaves.

name: Ghee Karam Idly
description: Idlis coated with ghee and a spicy karam powder, adding extra flavor and richness.

name: Sambhar Idly
description: Idlis soaked in hot sambhar, served with chutney on the side for added flavor.

name: Vada
description: Crispy, deep-fried lentil doughnuts with a crunchy exterior and soft interior.

name: Idly+Vada+Upma
description: A combo of soft idli, crispy vada, and flavorful upma, served with chutney and sambhar.

name: Upma
description: A savory semolina dish cooked with spices, vegetables, and a hint of lemon.

name: Sambhar Vada
description: Crispy vada soaked in hot sambhar, garnished with onions and fresh coriander.

name: Perugu Vada
description: Soft vada soaked in spiced yogurt and topped with tempered mustard seeds and chilies.

name: Mysore Bonda
description: Crispy, round fritters made with flour and spiced with green chilies and ginger.

name: Onion Minapa Dosa
description: Crispy dosa made with urad dal and rice batter, topped with onions and spices.

name: Plain Dosa
description: Classic thin and crispy dosa served with chutney and sambhar for dipping.

name: Masala Rava Dosa
description: Crispy rava dosa with a spiced potato filling, served with chutney and sambhar.

name: Upma Pesarattu
description: A unique combination of upma and pesarattu (green gram dosa), served with chutney.
